thread.section_title: Street Smart Transmission Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Street Smart Transmission | streetsmarttransmission.com
thread.title: Cheryli
thread.title_full: Street Smart Transmission reviewed by Cheryli

author: Cheryli
title: Cheryli
text: Street Smart used my trucks VIN to verify transmission purchase. Other shops did not ask for a VIN. The remanufactured transmission was delivered to the service garage within a week. I had to bring the transmission to another shop to be installed. I called Street Smart with the current shops name and address so the old transmission could be picked up for the core. This switch went smoother than I thought it would. Most importantly the transmission is working great!!
